channel.title: Home on Suchith's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Suchith's blog

item.title: Paper notes: Clickhouse - Lightning Fast Analytics for Everyone
item.description:
Link to the VLDB paper

Contents

  • Summary
  • Physical storage layer: MergeTree table engine
    • Parts, Blocks, Granules
    • Pruning strategies
      • Sparse index of primary key to granule
      • Skipping indexes
    • Merging different parts
    • Table partitioning across nodes
    • Table projections
  • Data Replication
  • Query processing
    • Performance optimizations

Summary

  • Distributed, analytical database optimized for high ingestion rates
  • Besides horizontal scalability, all major decisions revolve around
    1. High data ingestion rates
    2. Fast query execution

From section-2 of the paper

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Suchith J N. I am a software engineer. I currently live in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. This is my personal blog. I write about computer science and software engineering topics here. Opinions here are my own and not that of my employers - past, present or future.

item.title: Supporting HTTP/3 at the ingress gateway in Istio
item.description: A few months ago I contributed experimental HTTP/3 support at the Istio ingress gateway (PR). For the HTTPS gateway servers which terminate the TLS at the gateway, it automatically adds a mirror HTTP/3 listener over QUIC provided that there is an open UDP port. If there is an HTTPS server on TCP port 443, then an HTTP/3 server is automatically created on UDP port 443 as illustrated in the diagram below. All you need to do is to flip a switch on pilot and open UDP ports.
